Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Wakeforest Drive, between the Campus and the Highland Stables.
Room.LongDescription: It is important to note that riding a horse in town, especially in a busy section of town, is dangerous to both the pedestrians and to the horse. Therefore, a large stable has been placed near the eastern entrance to the city for the convinience of the guests. There are also a number of small inns near the eastern gates where visitors may relax after a long day of riding.
